A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie's plot is a lot of fan service sloppily glued together by uninteresting characters on who are more caught up with an SJW crusade than for any character or plot development. Its a testament to low bar expected of this community of film critics that success is based on an orgy of visually appealing affects\, blatantly sycophantic characters\, pointless fan-service and not much else. If Disney is the future of western culture I'm glad the have a trajectory towards failure\, let someone else have a turn.
